qualitative.reasoning: KEI Industries is led by a professional management team (Anil Gupta) that has consistently delivered on revenue guidance (17-18% CAGR target met or exceeded). The company maintains a conservative capital structure (Net Debt Free) despite aggressive capex plans for capacity expansion (Sanand plant). Return ratios (ROCE >20%) indicate efficient capital allocation. Transparency in reporting and strategic focus on retail/export segments further supports a high integrity score.
